page.title: 06TRADE - GOLDSITHNEY/MARAZION
page.content: {THE BLACKSMITH'S SHOP IN {GOLDSITHNEY}HAS BEEN IN BUSINESS FOR WELL OVER A HUNDRED YEARS.IT'S MAIN TRADE IS MENDING FARM MACHINERY AND MAKING GATES.THEY STILL DO HORSE SHOEING AND WHEEL BINDING. {THE BUILDING COMPANY OF R.B.BRYANT {& SONS,GOLDSITHNEY,}WAS STARTED IN 1908 AND HAS BEEN A FAMILY CONCERN EVER SINCE. {THE DEMOLITION FIRM OF JOHN {JAGO,GOLDSITHNEY,}WAS STARTED ABOUT 25 YEARS AGO AND IS NOW A THRIVING BUSINESS. { CARNE & EDDY,CARPENTERS,MARAZION,} HAVE BEEN ESTABLISHED 47 YEARS. {MOUNTS BAY GARAGE,MARAZION,}HAS BEEN THERE FOR NEARLY 40 YEARS. THEY DO SERVICING AND REPAIRS BUT SPECIALISE IN BODYWORK.
